body.p: In this article [1], the author’s name Azwatee Abdul Aziz was incorrectly written as Azwatee Abdul Abdul Aziz.
The original article has been corrected.

fn.p: The online version of the original article can be found at 10.1186/s12903-024-03910-w.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

element-citation.article-title: Application of deep learning and feature selection technique on external root resorption identification on CBCT images
